hero.title: {appName}
hero.description: We are a dynamic team of innovators, technologists, and industry leaders dedicated to shaping the future of digital business. Our core team brings together deep expertise in artificial intelligence, blockchain technology, fintech, and competitive programming, ensuring we deliver cutting-edge solutions for our clients.

expertiseCards.title: AI Expertise
expertiseCards.description: Our team includes an AI expert with hands-on experience in e-commerce, leveraging advanced machine learning to drive business growth and efficiency.

expertiseCards.title: Fintech & E-Wallet Leadership
expertiseCards.description: Our team director has a proven track record in the fintech sector, having successfully built and launched several e-wallet systems. Collectively, these systems manage over $100 million in assets under management (AUM) and serve more than 8 million active users. In addition, our e-wallet solutions have been successfully sold to five clients, generating over $2 million in revenue.

expertiseCards.title: Blockchain Innovation
expertiseCards.description: Our technical director has experience in successful blockchain startups, bringing a wealth of knowledge in decentralized technologies and secure digital transactions.

expertiseCards.title: Award-Winning Talent
expertiseCards.description: Our team members are recognized for their excellence in competitive programming, with national and regional ICPC awards that reflect our commitment to technical excellence and problem-solving.

expertiseCards.title: Quantitative Finance Leadership
expertiseCards.description: One of our advisors is a vice president at a global quantitative fund, with over 10 years of experience in financial markets and data-driven strategies.

expertiseCards.title: Finance & Legal Expertise
expertiseCards.description: Another advisor is a regional manager at a leading China-based e-payment company, with two decades of experience in cross-border e-commerce, finance, and legal compliance.

hero.endAboutUs:
We are proudly backed by a leading Singapore investment fund, which supports our vision and growth as we deliver innovative digital solutions to clients worldwide. 
 Together, we combine technical prowess, industry insight, and strategic vision to help businesses thrive in the digital age.

ourVision.title: Our Vision
ourVision.description:
Our vision is to empower businesses to thrive in the digital era by leading the way in digital transformation. We harness the power of artificial intelligence, advanced data platforms, and cutting-edge blockchain technology to deliver innovative solutions tailored to our clients’ needs. 
 
  While we have deep expertise in supporting clients in the finance and e-commerce sectors, our solutions are designed to drive success across a wide range of industries. By leveraging our multidisciplinary knowledge, we help organizations unlock new levels of efficiency, security, and growth-enabling them to stay ahead in an ever-evolving digital landscape.

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.description: Uriel partners with businesses to navigate the complexities of the digital era, offering expert guidance on leveraging AI, blockchain, and data-driven solutions. Our consulting approach focuses on understanding your unique challenges, defining strategic roadmaps, and unlocking sustainable growth opportunities.

outsourcing.title: Technology Outsourcing
outsourcing.description: Uriel delivers end-to-end technology outsourcing services that combine top-tier talent with proven methodologies. From software development and system integration to long-term maintenance, our outsourcing solutions ensure efficiency, scalability, and innovation - empowering you to focus on your core business while we handle the technology.

ourProducts.title: Our Products
ourProducts.description: Innovative, AI-driven solutions designed to help businesses accelerate growth, boost efficiency, and drive digital transformation.

products.title: Uriel Shop – E-commerce & Subscription Platform
products.description: A flexible e-commerce platform built to support both one-time and subscription-based sales, enabling businesses to scale recurring revenue streams while maintaining operational agility. Designed for adaptability and insight-driven decision making, it empowers merchants to respond to changing customer behavior and market demands with confidence.

keyFeatures.description: Handle both recurring and one-time purchases with ease.
Advanced segmentation and profiling to boost customer loyalty.
Efficiently manage product lines and SKUs.
Real-time revenue tracking and financial insights for smarter decisions.

products.title: Uriel Assistant – AI Assistant for Education
products.description: A chat-based AI assistant purpose-built for schools, designed to enhance personalized experience and empower with contextual academic support. Tailored for both teachers and learners, it delivers focused interactions that enhance productivity, autonomy, and engagement.

keyFeatures.description: Support multiple schools, classes, and user groups.
Deliver precise, contextualized AI assistance for teachers and students.

products.title: Uriel Node - Data & AI-Powered ETL Platform
products.description: Designed around a graph-based architecture, this ETL platform enables high-performance data workflows across distributed sources. Intelligent automation and built-in AI capabilities help teams reduce manual processing, streamline ingestion, and query data with greater clarity and control.

keyFeatures.description: OCR, NLP pipelines, LLM-based query assistant.

products.title: Uriel CRM – Customer Engagement Platform
products.description: Built to elevate how businesses connect with their customers, this platform blends automation and AI to support meaningful, timely engagement at every stage of the customer journey. From first touch to long-term retention, it enables teams to personalize outreach and scale communication with confidence.

keyFeatures.description: Target the right audience with precision.
Run automated email and push notification campaigns.
Engage customers 24/7 with real-time AI-powered assistance.

products.title: Uriel Accouting – E-commerce Financial Insight System
products.description: Financial data becomes actionable when it's unified, accessible, and tailored to your operations. This platform brings together imported and connected data sources to generate audit-ready financial reports, enabling e-commerce businesses to stay compliant, informed, and in control.

keyFeatures.description: Consolidate sales data from Amazon, Wix, and more.
Stay compliant with evolving financial regulations.
Safeguard sensitive data while ensuring easy retrieval.

clients.name: SLiner International
clients.description: A full-service consulting firm bridging global companies and Southeast Asia markets, especially Vietnam. Thoth Digital supported SLiner by developing tailored AI‑powered e‑commerce insights, helping their clients navigate new tax regimes and optimize cross-border strategies.

clients.name: GenestIT
clients.description: An Australian IT services provider focused on intelligent automation and DevOps. We partnered with GenestIT to integrate AI‑driven automation workflows and performance-optimized DevOps pipelines, boosting their clients’ platform reliability and efficiency.

directors.name: Thu Tran
directors.description: Over 12 years of experience in AI, software engineering, and data science.

directors.name: Linh Dieu Nguyen
directors.description: A strategic leader with 5 years of experience driving growth across multiple industries.

advisors.name: Tai Pham
advisors.description: Over 10 years experience in financial structure, payment, tax, accounting, M&A, and wealth management.

teamMembers.title: Our Members
teamMembers.description: We are a team of developers who are passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites.

members.name: Bui Khanh Duy
awards: ICPC National 2021, ICPC Northern Vietnam 2022 - Third Prize

footer.description: We are a team of developers who are passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites.
